subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Football
lead_paragraph: At least two of the men charged in the death of the  Redskins star Sean Taylor were involved in a burglary of his home days before his shooting death, a law enforcement official and a lawyer in the case said.
snippet: At least two of the men charged in the death of the  Redskins star Sean Taylor were involved in a burglary of his home days before his shooting death, a law enforcement official and a lawyer in the case said.
